name: Bloody Castle
description:
A topdown stealth maze game where as a ghost. you have to escape the castle and not get caught by the guards.

Fight, sneak, possess your way through the maze.

This is our entry for the Miz Jam 1, where the art-pack was set to: this art pack by Kenny

Credits:
Development: Oskar van Velden
Music and sfx: RQ
Level design: RQ

More information:
Created with Godot 3.2.2
Source: https://github.com/skarnl/miziziz-game-jam-2020
